scripts.build: echo BUILD_MARKER_2026_02_27_v7 && cd ../frontend && node -e "if(process.platform==='linux'){const cp=require('child_process');const r=cp.spawnSync('npm',['i','--no-save','--legacy-peer-deps','@rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu'],{stdio:'inherit'});if(r.status)process.exit(r.status);require('@rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu');console.log('ROLLUP_NATIVE_OK');}else{console.log('ROLLUP_NATIVE_SKIP_'+process.platform);}" && bun install && bunx vite build --outDir=../backend/frontend/dist
